RFLOMICS: Quick Guide to omics data analysis

Delphine Charif and Nadia Bessoltane

2022-06-24

RFLOMICS-vignette-Interface.Rmd

Abstract

Here, we will walk through -omics data analysis through the shiny inrerface to RFLOMICS . We will see how to set up the statistical framework of the designed protocol: ie translate biological condition comparisons into contrasts, perform quality controls and statistical analysis of the dataset: ie. find DEG per contrasts, identify cluster of co-expressed genes and perform a gene set enrichment analysis from lists of DEG or from clusters of co-expressed genes.

library(RFLOMICS)

Introduction:

Launch the application

capture ecran page de presentation

Set up the statistical framework

Capture ecran statistical
